options.content: This is a generated dashboard. Any changes made here will be lost on the next generation.

targets.expr: max(kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod, namespace, host_ip, pod_ip, node, created_by_kind, created_by_name, uid, priority_class, host_network)
sum(postgres_exporter_build_info{instance=~"$instance", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (branch, goarch, goos, goversion, revision, tags, version)
